introduction: Bhajjo Veero Ve (lit.Run Brothers) is an upcoming 2018 Indian-Punjabi romantic-comedy drama film written and directed by Amberdeep Singh. The film is produced by Karaj Gill and stars Amberdeep Singh, Simi Chahal, Nirmal Rishi, Guggu Gill and Hobby Dhaliwal in prominent roles. The film plots the story four unmarried men, out of which three have given up all hope of getting married while the fourth guy, played by Amberdeep Singh, fall in love with Simi Chahal. In order to get married to her, Amberdeep Singh had to find his long lost maternal family. The film is produced by Rhythm Boyz Entertainment in association with Hayre Omjee Studios.
